com.paypal.selion.platform.mobile.ios

Interface UIAutomationElement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    UIAutomationAlert, UIAutomationButton, UIAutomationNavigationBar, UIAutomationPicker, UIAutomationSlider, UIAutomationStaticText, UIAutomationSwitch, UIAutomationTableView, UIAutomationTextField
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UIAAlert, UIAButton, UIAElement, UIANavigationBar, UIAPicker, UIASlider, UIAStaticText, UIASwitch, UIATableView, UIATextField

    public interface UIAutomationElement
    UIAutomationElement is the super interface for all user interface elements in the context of the Automation instrument for automating user interface testing of iOS apps. This interface defines more general methods that can be used on any type of user interface elements.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns a string containing the label attribute of the element.

      void scrollToVisible()
      Scrolls until the specified element is visible in a container view.

      Taps the specified element and optionally waits for the provided expected elements.

      void twoFingerTap(Object... expected)
      Performs a two-finger (two-touch) tap on this element.

    • Method Detail

      • findElement

        org.openqa.selenium.WebElement findElement(String locator)
        Finds the corresponding web element using the string locator. The locator is internally converted into By entity and fed to RemoteWebElement.findElement(By) for further processing.
        Parameters:
        locator - A String that represents the means to locate this element (could be id/name/xpath/css locator).
        Returns:
        Instance of WebElement found by the locator.

      • doubleTap

        void doubleTap(Object... expected)
        Double-taps the specified element.
        Parameters:
        expected - Expected entities in the form of objects extending UIAElement or xpath location in the form of String or instances of ExpectedCondition.

      • scrollToVisible

        void scrollToVisible()
        Scrolls until the specified element is visible in a container view.

      • tap

        void tap(Object... expected)
        Taps the specified element and optionally waits for the provided expected elements.
        Parameters:
        expected - Expected entities in the form of objects extending UIAElement or xpath location in the form of String or instances of ExpectedCondition.

      • tapWithOptions

        void tapWithOptions(EnumMap<GestureOptions,String> gestureOptions,
                  Object... expected)
        Performs the specified gesture on the specified element using a EnumMap to specify gesture attributes. Refer GestureOptions for specifying gesture options.
        Parameters:
        gestureOptions - EnumMap specifying the gesture attributes.
        expected - Expected entities in the form of objects extending UIAElement or xpath location in the form of String or instances of ExpectedCondition.

      • twoFingerTap

        void twoFingerTap(Object... expected)
        Performs a two-finger (two-touch) tap on this element.
        Parameters:
        expected - Expected entities in the form of objects extending UIAElement or xpath location in the form of String or instances of ExpectedCondition.

      • getLabel

        String getLabel()
        Returns a string containing the label attribute of the element.
        Returns:
        The label of the element.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns a string containing the name attribute of the element.
        Returns:
        The name of the element.

      • getValue

        String getValue()
        Returns a string containing a value attribute specific to the type of element.
        Returns:
        The value of the element.
